definitions: in or toward the middle of something

examples.text: rounded petals blossom from a centrally placed flower

shortDefinitions: in way that is at point or in area that is in middle of something

definitions: in a way that is accessible from a variety of places

examples.text: the charming and centrally located village

shortDefinitions: in way that is accessible from variety of places

definitions: with the greatest importance or significance; essentially

examples.text: a clear recognition of how centrally important the ports are to sustaining economic growth

definitions: from or by a central organization or system

examples.text: key business strategies are organized centrally

shortDefinitions: from or by central organization or system
